docs.title: Welcome to STTK
docs.text: STTK - short for Systematic Trading Toolkit - is a suite of open source modules, datasets and tutorials designed to support the full lifecycle of systematic trading efforts: from idea generation, realistic event-driven backtesting and robustness-focused optimisation, through the definition of a portfolio integration pipeline for the selected strategies, to their monitored live execution and eventual discontinuation.

docs.title: Python
docs.text:
If you are new to Python, start with the official Python Tutorial.

To get an overview over important packages for data analysis (like pandas, numpy, matplotlib, etc.), read Python for Data Analysis, 3E by Wes McKinney.

docs.title: Git
docs.text: If you are new to Git or need a refresher, start with the (freely available) Pro Git book by Scott Chacon and Ben Straub.
